description:
Did you spend your summer break being productive, or just idling around? Pascal proves that you can even take idling to new heights! Meanwhile, a tenacious challenger learns that attempting the impossible will only lead to ruin, and Kitano Yuusuke senses more than anyone bargained for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Midsummer`s Idle Pascal / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
Manatsu no Himahima Pascal / Perfect Plate / 1% Pascal
真夏のヒマヒマパスカル / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 1%パスカル
